posts.post_content:
Chuck, that Cobb is beautiful!
Joe

[quote name="ezez420" post=1247617]Nice card. One just sold on ebay for $1350 last week.[/QUOTE]

It'd help to mention the case was glued together by a 5 year old and sells Betty Boop collectibles for 90 cents. He also have 83% positive feedback. No scam attempt there.

Well I guess the one in Clean Sweep that sold was glued also.  The one on ebay was legit as well. 


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk HD
and why exactly the **** is this being discussed in THIS THREAD????

[quote name="CW" post=1247682]and why exactly the **** is this being discussed in THIS THREAD????[/QUOTE]

Agreed!!!!!!!!!! Why hijack Chuck's thread?? Beauty of a card and great seller here, folks!!

Ed,

I dont know you or Chuck but i am sure you guys are both great people.  I would suggest however, that you take the time to read the forum rules before you go out and hijack his card, his thread, and his time.  Leon ought to kick you straight in the junk for this--as if common decency isnt enough, please do yourself and everyone else on this forum a favor and familiarize yourself with  the do's and dont's. This is absolutely classless and completely unproductive. 


 
"There should be no interference by 3rd parties within the Buy/Sell/Trade areas. Third parties are those not involved in a transaction. This includes, but is not limited to, posting current or historical cost information, commenting negatively on the offer or item, or anything that interferes with the listing in a negative way"

Noel Wrye

[quote name="ezez420" post=1247711] This card has not sold above $1500 in over 5 years.[/QUOTE]

I can say, you are incorrect. Private sales happen all the time.

[quote name="ezez420" post=1247617]Nice card. One just sold on ebay for $1350 last week.[/QUOTE]
Is there s rule against pissing on people's BST thread?

[quote name="Republicaninmass" post=1247730]Is there s rule against pissing on people's BST thread?[/QUOTE]

yup!!

"There should be no interference by 3rd parties within the Buy/Sell/Trade areas. Third parties are those not involved in a transaction. This includes, but is not limited to, posting current or historical cost information, commenting negatively on the offer or item, or anything that interferes with the listing in a negative way"
I removed my comments. I am sorry for insulting some of you sensitive folks.

[quote name="ezez420" post=1247732]I removed my comments. I am sorry for insulting some of you sensitive folks.[/QUOTE]

Not being sensitive Ed, just following the rules!! :p

Thanks for the support, guys.  :)

no biggie -- life goes on.

And when you're finished, Ed, if you wouldn't mind cleaning up?

[quote name="ezez420" post=1247732]I removed my comments. I am sorry for insulting some of you sensitive folks.[/QUOTE]

They are right. It's not about being sensitive. It's about interfering in a BST thread and it's a no, no. 

I don't read every single thread on the board so I hope folks will PM when this kind of stuff happens so I can take care of it. You will remain anonymous and I will never tell who PMs me. There are reasons for the rules and they are mostly tried and true and work.....thanks all....

[quote name="DeanH3" post=1247721]I can say, you are incorrect. Private sales happen all the time.[/QUOTE]

I can vouch for that... With the E90-1 Jackson's I had in 1.5, VCP showed $6k (kept getting this quoted to me saying my 8k price was high, I private sold one a few months before that for $8.2k, then auctioned one and it set a new high at $10.2k
